articles.content: Labourers masquerading as cricket players, clever camera angles and fake team names were all part of an elaborate hoax cricket league in western India shown on YouTube that was used to draw money fro… [+1904 chars]

articles.title: Everton goalkeeper signs new contract ahead of USA tour - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Goalkeeper Andy Lonergan has signed a new contract with Everton ahead of the team flying out for their two-game tour of the USA
articles.content: Andy Lonergan has signed a new contract with Everton ahead of the Blues flying out to the USA. The goalkeeper was signed by Rafael Benitez last summer but was one of the two out-of-contract players c… [+1593 chars]
